name: Movie Premiere
description:
To commemorate the 2nd anniversary of the passing of Dean “Dee” Hudson, a new documentary titled The Life and Death of the Runaway Boys has been released. 

This feature length movie documents the musical origins of the three brothers, their rise as an exciting band on the Melbourne scene and the tragedy that ultimately ended it all.

It is a revealing insight into the band as told by the boys themselves, featuring never before seen footage of the Runaway Boys live, backstage and in the studio.

A must for all fans, friends and family, The Life and Death of the Runaway Boys will be shown on the BIG screen for one night only.

Sunday September 27th
7pm sharp

Sun Theatre
8 Ballarat Street, Yarraville

Tickets $20 each.

name: The Life and Death of the Runaway Boys DVD
description: Buy your own copy of The Life and Death of the Runaway Boys. The DVD release includes the film, trailer and bonus footage of a range of songs performed by the Runaway Boys.

name: The Life and Death of the Runaway Boys Soundtrack CD
description: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack to the film The Life and Death of the Runaway Boys. Features music from the Runaway Boys, Stray Cats, Elvis Presley, Blue Moon Boys and more...

name: Running Wild EP
description: The Runaway Boys' debut ep features the hit "Fallen Down" plus 4 other great tracks all recorded at Hothouse Studios.
